subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Detroit Manager Jim Leyland adjusted his batting order, the Tigers responded with five runs in the second inning and went on to beat the Red Sox and tie the A.L.C.S. at 2-2.
snippet: After Detroit Manager Jim Leyland adjusted his batting order, the Tigers responded with five runs in the second inning and went on to beat the Red Sox and tie the A.L.C.S. at 2-2.
